channel.description: CIS 527 Lab 3 - HTTP Hypertext Transfer Protocol (HTTP) Image Source: Wikipedia HTTP Developed by Tim Berners-Lee at CERN in 1989 Built On TCP Text-Based Protocol Used to Access the World Wide Web HTTP Commands GET POST HEAD PUT DELETE HTTP Status Codes 200 - OK 301 - Moved Permanently 403 - Forbidden 404 - Not Found 500 - Internal Server Error 503 - Service Unreachable Image Source: Wikipedia
